first_para: Robert Thomas William McCrea (born 6 August 1948) is a Democratic Unionist Party politician and Free Presbyterian minister from Northern Ireland. He represented Antrim South and Mid Ulster as their Member of Parliament.

full.extract: Robert Thomas William McCrea (born 6 August 1948) is a Democratic Unionist Party politician and Free Presbyterian minister from Northern Ireland. He represented Antrim South and Mid Ulster as their Member of Parliament.
full.title: William McCrea (politician)
